content.text: Match ends, Chelsea 4, Brentford 0.
Second Half ends, Chelsea 4, Brentford 0.
Foul by Michy Batshuayi (Chelsea).
Yoann Barbet (Brentford) wins a free kick in the defensive half.
Attempt missed. Diego Costa (Chelsea) header from the centre of the box misses to the left. Assisted by Branislav Ivanovic with a cross.
Nathaniel Chalobah (Chelsea) is shown the yellow card for a bad foul.
Andreas Bjelland (Brentford) wins a free kick in the defensive half.
Foul by Diego Costa (Chelsea).
Attempt missed. Jota (Brentford) left footed shot from a difficult angle and long range on the right is just a bit too high from a direct free kick.
Konstantin Kerschbaumer (Brentford) wins a free kick on the right wing.
Foul by Nathaniel Chalobah (Chelsea).
Goal!  Chelsea 4, Brentford 0. Michy Batshuayi (Chelsea) converts the penalty with a right footed shot to the bottom left corner.
Penalty Chelsea. Branislav Ivanovic draws a foul in the penalty area.
Penalty conceded by Yoann Barbet (Brentford) after a foul in the penalty area.
Offside, Chelsea. Diego Costa tries a through ball, but Kenedy is caught offside.
Substitution, Brentford. Konstantin Kerschbaumer replaces Josh McEachran.
Attempt missed. Kurt Zouma (Chelsea) right footed shot from outside the box misses to the right. Assisted by Cesc Fàbregas.
Delay over. They are ready to continue.
Substitution, Chelsea. Diego Costa replaces Pedro.
Delay in match John Egan (Brentford) because of an injury.
Attempt missed. Michy Batshuayi (Chelsea) right footed shot from the right side of the box misses to the left. Assisted by Cesc Fàbregas.
Attempt blocked. Pedro (Chelsea) left footed shot from the centre of the box is blocked. Assisted by Michy Batshuayi.
Kurt Zouma (Chelsea) wins a free kick in the defensive half.
Foul by Scott Hogan (Brentford).
Substitution, Chelsea. Kenedy replaces César Azpilicueta.
Goal!  Chelsea 3, Brentford 0. Branislav Ivanovic (Chelsea) right footed shot from the right side of the box to the bottom right corner. Assisted by Pedro following a fast break.
Corner,  Chelsea. Conceded by John Egan.
Attempt blocked. Ruben Loftus-Cheek (Chelsea) right footed shot from the centre of the box is blocked.
Foul by Jota (Brentford).
Kurt Zouma (Chelsea) wins a free kick in the defensive half.
Substitution, Brentford. Jota replaces Lasse Vibe.
Substitution, Brentford. Scott Hogan replaces Romaine Sawyers.
Substitution, Chelsea. Branislav Ivanovic replaces Willian.
Attempt saved. Nico Yennaris (Brentford) left footed shot from the centre of the box is saved in the centre of the goal. Assisted by Ryan Woods.
Offside, Brentford. Yoann Barbet tries a through ball, but Nico Yennaris is caught offside.
Attempt missed. Pedro (Chelsea) left footed shot from outside the box is too high. Assisted by Cesc Fàbregas.
Ruben Loftus-Cheek (Chelsea) hits the bar with a left footed shot from the left side of the box. Assisted by Willian with a through ball.
Attempt saved. Michy Batshuayi (Chelsea) left footed shot from outside the box is saved in the top centre of the goal. Assisted by Willian.
Foul by Maxime Colin (Brentford).
Ruben Loftus-Cheek (Chelsea) wins a free kick in the defensive half.
Maxime Colin (Brentford) is shown the yellow card for a bad foul.
Foul by Maxime Colin (Brentford).
Ruben Loftus-Cheek (Chelsea) wins a free kick in the defensive half.
Foul by Cesc Fàbregas (Chelsea).
Nico Yennaris (Brentford) wins a free kick on the left wing.
Cesc Fàbregas (Chelsea) wins a free kick in the defensive half.
Foul by John Egan (Brentford).
Foul by Pedro (Chelsea).
Lasse Vibe (Brentford) wins a free kick on the left wing.
Attempt missed. Willian (Chelsea) right footed shot from the centre of the box misses to the right. Assisted by Ruben Loftus-Cheek.
Ruben Loftus-Cheek (Chelsea) wins a free kick in the defensive half.
Foul by John Egan (Brentford).
Foul by Michy Batshuayi (Chelsea).
Harlee Dean (Brentford) wins a free kick in the defensive half.
Attempt blocked. Lasse Vibe (Brentford) left footed shot from the right side of the box is blocked.
Willian (Chelsea) wins a free kick in the attacking half.
Foul by Andreas Bjelland (Brentford).
Second Half begins Chelsea 2, Brentford 0.
First Half ends, Chelsea 2, Brentford 0.
Offside, Brentford. Romaine Sawyers tries a through ball, but Lasse Vibe is caught offside.
Attempt saved. Yoann Barbet (Brentford) left footed shot from a difficult angle and long range on the left is saved in the centre of the goal. Assisted by Lasse Vibe with a headed pass.
Corner,  Brentford. Conceded by Nathaniel Chalobah.
Attempt blocked. Lasse Vibe (Brentford) left footed shot from a difficult angle on the left is blocked.
Corner,  Brentford. Conceded by Pedro.
Offside, Chelsea. Nathaniel Chalobah tries a through ball, but Nathan Aké is caught offside.
Attempt saved. Ruben Loftus-Cheek (Chelsea) right footed shot from the right side of the box is saved in the bottom right corner. Assisted by Cesc Fàbregas.
Corner,  Chelsea. Conceded by Daniel Bentley.
Attempt missed. Cesc Fàbregas (Chelsea) right footed shot from outside the box is close, but misses to the left. Assisted by Willian.
Corner,  Chelsea. Conceded by John Egan.
Offside, Chelsea. Nathaniel Chalobah tries a through ball, but Pedro is caught offside.
Offside, Chelsea. Cesc Fàbregas tries a through ball, but Pedro is caught offside.
Attempt missed. Nathan Aké (Chelsea) left footed shot from the centre of the box misses to the left. Assisted by Cesc Fàbregas with a cross following a corner.
Corner,  Chelsea. Conceded by Daniel Bentley.
Attempt saved. Ruben Loftus-Cheek (Chelsea) right footed shot from outside the box is saved in the top centre of the goal.
Foul by Andreas Bjelland (Brentford).
Willian (Chelsea) wins a free kick in the attacking half.
Attempt saved. Michy Batshuayi (Chelsea) right footed shot from the right side of the six yard box is saved in the bottom right corner. Assisted by Kurt Zouma.
Attempt blocked. Michy Batshuayi (Chelsea) header from the centre of the box is blocked. Assisted by John Terry with a headed pass.
Corner,  Chelsea. Conceded by John Egan.
Attempt blocked. Ruben Loftus-Cheek (Chelsea) right footed shot from the centre of the box is blocked. Assisted by Cesc Fàbregas.
Goal!  Chelsea 2, Brentford 0. Pedro (Chelsea) left footed shot from the right side of the box to the bottom right corner. Assisted by Michy Batshuayi.
Attempt missed. John Terry (Chelsea) right footed shot from outside the box misses to the left. Assisted by Cesc Fàbregas following a corner.
Corner,  Chelsea. Conceded by Andreas Bjelland.
Goal!  Chelsea 1, Brentford 0. Willian (Chelsea) from a free kick with a right footed shot to the top right corner.
Foul by Lasse Vibe (Brentford).
Pedro (Chelsea) wins a free kick in the attacking half.
Corner,  Chelsea. Conceded by Nico Yennaris.
Kurt Zouma (Chelsea) wins a free kick on the right wing.
Foul by Lasse Vibe (Brentford).
Attempt missed. Harlee Dean (Brentford) header from the centre of the box misses to the left. Assisted by Josh McEachran with a cross following a corner.
Corner,  Brentford. Conceded by Kurt Zouma.
Foul by Ruben Loftus-Cheek (Chelsea).
Ryan Woods (Brentford) wins a free kick in the attacking half.
Attempt missed. Pedro (Chelsea) left footed shot from outside the box is high and wide to the left. Assisted by Cesc Fàbregas.
Ruben Loftus-Cheek (Chelsea) wins a free kick in the defensive half.
Foul by John Egan (Brentford).
First Half begins.
Lineups are announced and players are warming up.
